channel.title: CVE Feed for Google Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-9498|2024-08-05T07:24:54.919Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In SkSampler::Fill of SkSampler.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android ID: A-78354855

item.title: CVE-2018-9567|2024-08-05T07:24:56.257Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: On Pixel devices there is a bug causing verified boot to show the same certificate fingerprint despite using different signing keys.
